RCA type 77 uni directional Microphone t-shirt by Yukio Miyamoto.
This microphone had two ribbons a pressure ribbon and a velocity ribbon, the 77 C enabled a choice of pickup from one or the other or both.
column2: The switch can be seen at the bottom of the mic.&nbsp

column1: The precision of Yukio's simulation matches the manufacturing quality of the microphone.
column2:
Show your appreciation of sound and precision, wear our RCA type 77 Microphone t shirt by Yukio Miyamoto.
